item.title: A Message from Mme. Perron.
item.description: There will be a Europe Trip meeting Thursday, Feb 12th at lunch in room 125. All travelers must attend as we are planning our March Charcuterie Fundraiser.

item.title: A message from Mme. Perron:
item.description: A reminder to all unity club members that we will meet twice a week from now until our Elevate and Empower event. The team will meet today at lunch in room 127. All students must attend.

item.title: A message from the Main Office:
A message from: Ms. Brennan.
item.description: Hey STA gardening enthusiasts! Are you dreaming of warmer weather and spring planting? Then get your gardening gloves ready because the Garden Club is meeting this Thursday at lunch in room 201! We'll be brainstorming ideas for winter gardening activities and getting a head start on planning spring initiatives. Whether you're a seasoned gardener or just curious about getting your hands dirty, we'd love to have you! New members are always welcome!

item.title: A message from Mme. Perron:
item.description: Could Shaelah Smith, Aila Laird and Madison Burtt please see Mme. Perron in room 125 following announcements today.

item.title: A message from Ms. Brennan:
item.description: Calling all adventurers! Join the Dungeons & Dragons Club to create epic characters, battle monsters, and tell amazing stories with friendsâ€”no experience needed, just imagination and teamwork. Stop by room 201 at lunch this Friday to learn more.
